titleStmt.title: William Kidd et al. to James F. Robinson
CWG7682

availability.p: This image and transcription is publicly accessible. The image appears courtesy of the repository named in the Source Description. The transcription and annotation were undertaken by Kentucky Historical Society staff, volunteers, and interns. If referencing this document title, accession number, and permanent URL.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition
Early Access

msIdentifier.repository: Kentucky Department for Libraries and Archives
msIdentifier.collection: Office of the Governor, James F. Robinson: Appointments by the Governor, Military Appointments, 1862-1863

body.p:
Franklin, Simpson Co Ky
30" Aug 1862,
Governor James F. Robertson,
Frankfort, Ky,
Sir,

In the event, that a draft should become necessary, We hope your Excellency will appoint M. D. Whitesides Esq, Commissioner to Superintend said Draft. his energy, impartiality, and business qualifications eminently befit him for the Post.
You will very much oblige His friends, by confering the appointment,

Very Respectfully,
William Kidd J. S. C.
W. G. Wade Sheriff
Wm W. Bush County atty
F D Wade D S
Chas. F. Potter P. M.
James McCartney D P M
Wm W. Beson, Circuit Court Clerk
James Roberts Jailor
A. B. Cookling P. J. F.
T C Murphy T. Marshal
Geo H Millikin C H C
